channel.title: [317] gfx help! [317]
channel.description:
Alright, So I'm using a 317 DemisePk base, and I'm working on the God Sword specials, the only problem is, the GFX's don't seem to exist >< So,
1.) Where are GFX's stored? 2.) How do I make a custom GFX?
Thanks in advance - Sideways_8
P.S. I have MSN -----> Rockthefender92@aim.com
